attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: just because there are a number of people who don`t control their dogs/ doe`s not mean that all owners are idiots.. if dogs are that vicious the owner should heavily find and the dog should be distroyed  we are not all the same. you will find people who cannot afford this will just dump these poor animals

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
